txt.en: 'We cannot have this. We just cannot. Do you see how dark it is here? The market lasts well into the night, even after second supper sometimes. If people cannot see where they are going, someone could get hurt!\n\n'The lamps along the pathways need to be lit and to stay that way. If you go out and light them for me, I would appreciate it greatly.'
'So the paths are all lit? Good, now those wandering after dessert have nothing to fear!'
'The lamps must burn the whole night through.'
The paths of the Northcotton Farm are lit by lamps which over time will burn out and need to be replaced.

Burned-out lamps can be found on the paths around the Northcotton Farm.\n\nMilo Longfurrow has asked you to help him illuminate the area by lighting the lamps around the Farmer's Market at the Northcotton Farm.
Milo Longfurrow is in Northcotton Farm.\n\nMilo Longfurrow will be pleased to hear the lamps will burn the night through.
